meanings.definition: To support and move something from one place to another.
meanings.sent1: The strong ant carries a leaf to its nest.
meanings.sent2: She carries her backpack to school every day.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel carries acorns in its cheeks like a tiny storage unit.
meanings.sent4: His smile carries happiness wherever he goes.
meanings.sent5: The river carries fallen leaves downstream in the gentle current.

meanings.sent1: The basket carries fresh fruits from the market.
meanings.sent2: He carries a heavy burden on his shoulders.
meanings.sent3: The cloud carries raindrops waiting to fall.
meanings.sent4: Her voice carries a tune that soothes the soul.
meanings.sent5: The wind carries the scent of blooming flowers through the air.

meanings.definition: To transport something from one place to another.
meanings.sent1: The truck carries goods to the warehouse.
meanings.sent2: The train carries passengers to their destinations.
meanings.sent3: The stork carries babies in a special delivery service.
meanings.sent4: His words carry wisdom beyond his years.
meanings.sent5: The wind carries the kite high up into the sky.
